summary: April 20 is the 110th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Raymond van Barneveld  is a Dutch professional darts player, currently playing in the Professional Darts Corporation. Nicknamed Barney, he is a five-time World Darts Champion , a two-time UK Open Champion and a former winner of the Las Vegas Desert Classic, the Grand Slam of Darts and the Premier League. He is also a twice-winner of the World Masters and the World Darts Trophy, and a three-time winner of the International Darts League and the WDF World Cup Singles event.
Also accomplished in pairs competition, van Barneveld has twice won the PDC World Cup of Darts  and the WDF World Cup Pairs once , all whilst representing the Netherlands. He has also won the PDC World Pairs with Roland Scholten.
From January to June 2008, he was the world's number one ranked player. His victory in the 2007 PDC final, added to his four previous BDO Championships brought him level with Eric Bristow as a five-time world champion; he is one of only three players in darts history to achieve this. He is the most successful Dutch darts player to date, and has had a significant effect in raising the popularity of darts in the Netherlands. He is naturally left-handed but throws his darts right-handed.
title: Raymond van Barneveld
